mapper.insert: insert into f_fund_net_worth (fund_info_code, fund_day, fund_net_worth, level_number, level_front, level_behind, create_time) values (#{fundInfoCode}, #{fundDay}, #{fundNetWorth}, #{levelNumber}, #{levelFront}, #{levelBehind},now());

insert into f_fund_net_worth_temp (fund_info_code, fund_day, fund_net_worth, level_number, level_front, level_behind, create_time) values (#{fundInfoCode}, #{fundDay}, #{fundNetWorth}, #{levelNumber}, #{levelFront}, #{levelBehind},now());
mapper.select: select id, fund_type_number AS fundTypeNumber, fund_type_name AS fundTypeName, sorting, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from f_fund_net_worth where delete_status = 0 order by sorting, create_time limit #{page}, #{limit};
